promptVersions.body:
PLANNED START TIME

09:00 Paris time, Sunday, June 05, 2022


PLANNED END TIME

09:45 Paris time, Sunday, June 05, 2022


The APIs and the Salesforce applications will be fully unavailable for 45 minutes before going back to regular use.


During this maintenance, the main impacts are:

 

  • A customer will be able to order products in LV.COM only under the guest profile;
  • No Now Yours order validation in ATG;
  • The login/registration in LV App/Lv.com will be unavailable;
  • ICON (Mobile/Desktop/MP), ICONICS, Catalogue CSC, Now Yours, Wardrobing, Appointment, VOICE will be unavailable;
  • The CSC teams will receive inbound call from the clients from Genesys or Cisco;
  • The integration flows will be delayed.
promptVersions.title: API and applications unavailable
